TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void UploadFileCompletedEventHandler(object sender, UploadFileCompletedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed UploadFileCompletedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub UploadFileCompletedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As UploadFileCompletedEventArgs)
public delegate void UploadFileCompletedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, UploadFileCompletedEventArgs ^ e);

param.name: e
param.span: Um que contém dados do evento.

summary.span: Representa o método que manipulará o evento de de .

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Quando você cria um delegado, você identificar o método que manipulará o evento.When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. Para associar o evento com o manipulador de eventos, adicione uma instância do representante ao evento.To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. O manipulador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que você remova o representante.The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. Para obter mais informações sobre delegados de manipulador de eventos, consulte [NIB: eventos e delegados](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).For more information about event handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115). ## Examples O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra assincronamente carregando um arquivo.The following code example demonstrates asynchronously uploading a file. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#6)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#6)] O seguinte método é chamado quando o carregamento for concluído.The following method is called when the upload completes. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#7)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#7)]
